entry.title: TimDami week 2025: Seven Days to Save a Soul
entry.summary:
Author: ShadowedRogueBat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,565Chapters: 4/8Kudos: 26

Summary: Damian Wayne has already gone to hell once. He has no desire to go back there, going so far as to meet with John Constantine to find a way to prevent it. If only Drake would stop sticking his pretty nose into Damian's business. Timothy Drake trusts Damian. Of course, after all this time working together, he does. But he can't help investigating when he finds Damian meeting with Constantine and sneaking away to abandoned league bases. He just wants to know what Damian is up to. The attraction he feels for the younger man has nothing to do with it, of course. TimDami week 2025 has inspired a story out of me.

entry.title: Damian's Education
entry.summary:
Author: Voyager6

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,603Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 179

Summary: Damian Wayne had a habit of staying up late lost in thought (it was something that ran in the family). One night he saw something he shouldn't have, and it left him with more questions than answers. What's worse, it could damage his already strained relationship with both Tim and their father. Rated M for strong language and adult situations. Little did I realize just how prophetic this story was. I read yesterday that dc was going to have Tim come out as bisexual. And there's the possibilty of a 'more than friends' relationship with Conner Kent.
